CustomField.description: API Name of the fields. Cross objects reference such as Opportunity.Account.Customer_Number__c is allowed. Use AGGREGATE along with Aggregate Expression for calculated roll-up summary on child object
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API Name of the fields. Cross objects reference such as Opportunity.Account.Customer_Number__c is allowed. Use AGGREGATE along with Aggregate Expression for calculated roll-up summary on child object
CustomField.label: Field Name
